title: ARM: os.Stat has zero FileInfo.Mode field
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. os.Stat("/")

What is the expected output?

fileinfo.IsDirectory() is true

What do you see instead?

false  the fileinfo.Mode field is zero.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

linux / arm

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

18926649cda7 release.2010-08-25/release
